groups.name: spring.python.py4j
groups.description: Configuration properties for the Py4J integration between Java and Python processes.

groups.name: spring.python.resolver.py4j
groups.description: Configuration properties for the Py4J-based Python resolver used to bridge Java and Python environments.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.enabled
properties.description: Whether the Py4J autoconfiguration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.host
properties.description: Host address of the Java-side Py4J GatewayServer.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.port
properties.description: Port number on which the Java-side Py4J GatewayServer listens.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.python-host
properties.description: Host address of the Python-side Py4J client or callback server.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.python-port
properties.description: Port number for the Python-side Py4J callback server.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout (in milliseconds) when establishing the Py4J gateway connection. A value of 0 means no timeout.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.read-timeout
properties.description: Read timeout (in milliseconds) for communication through the Py4J gateway. A value of 0 means no timeout.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.auth-token
properties.description: Authentication token used to secure the Py4J connection between Java and Python processes.

properties.name: spring.python.py4j.loggable
properties.description: Whether communication details and errors between Java and Python via Py4J should be logged.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.py4j.import-line
properties.description: Python import statement required to initialize the Py4J JavaGateway module.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.py4j.gateway-object
properties.description: Python code template used to create and configure the Py4J JavaGateway instance.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.py4j.gateway-properties
properties.description: List of Py4J gateway parameters injected into the gateway object template. Supports Spring property placeholders.
